website_summaries.verdict: Set of 3 pans consisting of high-quality steel, so food will not stick to them.
pros: With a set of 3 pans of different diameters, you can make multi-layer cakes easily
Kit includes an icing spatula and an icing smoother for a good value
Safe to use at temperatures up to 450°F
cons: With 4", 7", and 9" springform pans, this set's pans are a little smaller than some other sets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once but it was super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great value, Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baking needs. The spring form pans function nicely and have a non stick surface, they are of a good weight and not flimsy at all. They came with a frosting spreader and a smoother. They were packed very nicely. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia BF

customer_reviews.title: Pan leaks
customer_reviews.text: Just tried using this to bake a cake. It was a thinner type batter and the pan leaked (although the cake still came out mostly OK). However, cake is very difficult to release from the bottom plate (even with greasing and flouring). I think a different batter type and using parchment paper in the future may help. I like that this set comes with the offset spatula and icing smoother. I imagine I might be able to use these again for other things (not regular cake) so it's not a complete wash but, overall, I don't recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chang

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because my good set was packed. We are in the process of moving. I read the reviews and thought these would be a good replacement set....NOT THE CASE. They leak terribly. The cake I made leaked all over my oven. What a mess. If I could return them I would. Very disappointed Worst thing ever it leaks everywhere !!! Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bargain set
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find an 8" anywhere except for pricey stores. This set is sound and though I didn't need the 9" I found the liner papers to be a big plus - no measuring and cutting parchment, which means throwing away a lot of paper each time. Have used the 8" three times in two weeks and it holds up without any problems. I'd buy this again and would recommend to friends, though 'kitchen snobs' might want to pay more for essentially the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Calling it leak proof has to be a spoof.
customer_reviews.text: My significant other bought these for me as a surprise. I've only tried to use them once and they leaked all over my counter. I thought I actually poured the mix on the counter, I moved the pan to wipe up the mess and it poured out of the entire circumference of the bottom of the pan while in my hand. I'm not sure why it's not a solid, or at the very least overlapping, piece.
customer_reviews.author: DejionA

customer_reviews.title: It suffices.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a spring firm pan before. And although they don’t leak, after the cake was made and removed, there were bits left in the lip of the ring that secured around the bottom. It was a pain trying to get it all out and I’m not entire sure I have. Also, slightly concerned about possible rust build up over time in this area as well. We shall see. It worked in a pinch and did as it was intended to do and for the price, I can’t complain too much. However if the best is what you like, this might not be it. The frosting tools are an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: pjtavish

customer_reviews.title: They DO leak
customer_reviews.text: Yeah these are not leakproof. If you have a runny batter-like for chocolate cakes, use a regular tin and line with parchment on the bottom. These leak at the welded seams. I had leakage with my previous pans on a chocolate cake batter. I thought it was my pans, but these brand new ones do the same thing. For thicker batters like cheesecakes they probably work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Anne

customer_reviews.title: The pan leaks badly
customer_reviews.text: The pan is leaky. Fortunately for me I was making a cheesecake with water bath so the batter did not leak into the oven but half into the water bath. The pan is also sticky to the cake. The groove where the side and the bottom meet is difficult to clean. Overall, I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: oneforjule

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a ring pan that would fit into my power pressure XL as I have a recipe for a cheese cake make in a ring pan and cooked in the pressure cooker.. The pans arrived on time and in great condition. I cannot attest to their being leak proof as I have not yet used them. But they are very well manufactured, heavy duty, not cheap and in perfect condition. Cant wait to use them,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hiware Springform pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of springform pans. I like the non-stick feature. I made a recipe that said to place tin foil under the pan as when the butter melts it will leak. I did as followed and it did leak into the foil. I haven't used the pans for anything else, so can state whether it leaks with cake batters, etc.
customer_reviews.author: N.E.

customer_reviews.title: Makes baking a cake very easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan set! I was forced to make my 4 year olds birthday cake this year because of the quarantine and this set made it extremely easy! The cake did not stick at all and cake out very moist.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Received item as described. Quality materials. Non stick surface will assist in my baking.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used the 3 piece set to bake a layer cake in the oven. It did not leak cake batter. I wanted thick layers so I used 2 box cake mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Kccck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use my new set yet, but upon opening the box I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. I ordered the set of 6-8-10" and could not be more pleased. Good heavy, non-stick pans. The springform mechanism looks sturdy and well made. My old flimsy 10" pan went right into the trash! I can't wait to create.
customer_reviews.author: C. Solana

customer_reviews.title: Leak Guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Leakproof? It’s a lie. I put my batter in and it leaked immediately. Very poor product
customer_reviews.author: Care Bear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these kinds of pans! They are easy to use and it’s so nice to unlatch it and take the ring off and not have to worry about trying to scrap the cake out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They made a perfect cheesecake and I plan to use them as often as possible
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheesecake, no leaking so far
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to buy these having read some people experienced leaking from them, but I used them for cheesecake with crust and did not have any issues. They work amazingly and my cake was tha bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Juliette Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Good for ice cakes
customer_reviews.text: I used these pans to make ice cream cake & had no issues... no seeping through
customer_reviews.author: La Rubia

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. They are perfect, and the price for all three was amazing. I’ve made multiple cakes now, and everyone bakes and releases perfectly. Added bonus was the perfectly cut parchment liners!
customer_reviews.author: SCT

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: This product leaks! It leaked all over the bottom of my oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L.

customer_reviews.title: Leaked and Nonstick Coating Peeled Off
customer_reviews.text: These leaked. I had foil around the outside of the pan as an extra preventative measure against leaking, but some water from the water bath got behind the foil and it soaked into my crust. When I released the springform, water actually dripped off the bottom. It ruined it to the point that I could not remove the cheesecake from the pan without breaking it. Also, when I lightly ran the back of the knife around the small one to separate it from the pan, the nonstick layer peeled off and stuck to the cheesecake. It was an inexpensive set and you get what you pay for with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great variety pack.....work well so far!
customer_reviews.text: This pack of 3 springform pans is great. My daughter wanted to make a 3-tier cake and this fit the bill perfectly. These are really easy to use and easy to clean. I can't comment on durability since we've only had them for a few weeks but so far very happy with the product. The icing spatula is a really nice addition as well. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Croft

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking spring form pans. Nest into each other nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kdeanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great sizes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use in the pressure cooker. Great quality and great sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Karen BT

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: Very good value, well made products! Easy to use and clean!!!!!! I used it to make cheesecake for the first time, no issue whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: IceQueen

customer_reviews.title: It is broken.. the bottom part leaks
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return this.... it leaks! When I poured the cake mix there it leaked from the bottom and messed up my cake completely
customer_reviews.author: Behnoosh

customer_reviews.title: Cake batter don't leak out. Cooks evenly. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It states that it is non stick however after making cheese cake in it I found out that it is hard to remove the cake from the pan. So the bottom plate has become the cake holder too. Not saying it not really non stick but with the bottom having grooves it makes it hard to get off. Gonna experiment more since this was my first time using it. All in all thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: David Shrum

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a springform pan but wanted to make a cheesecake for a special occasion. This was great! The cheesecake turned out perfect and it was easy to use. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used them for many different things so far. Some people complained of leaking but I have not had that issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jillisa

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof/cheesecake with crust will not come off pan
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitley not leak proof. I've used it twice to make cheesecake--once in the oven and once in the instant pot, both times there was significant leakage. To make matters worse, it is virtually impossible to get the crust of the cheescake off the bottom of the pan (despite having been heaving greased) without it crumbling and falling apart. I will not be using again.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not only was I missing parts of my order but I went to bake my cake 3-tier and it looked like it Cook well until I went to take it out it had burnt all around the edges and the bottom and it was extremely hard to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: They LEAK!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of these spring form pans leak as soon as I put the batter in them. My stove was smoking within minutes. Then when trying to release the clasp to get the cake out the "spring" did not work. I have to pry the pans open with a knife after releasing the clasp as they appear to have gotten stuck, gummed up with cakes batter, never worked (not really sure). I have had spring form pans in the past and NEVER had these issues. Could not return as the return window closed before I got to use them. Not a good buy, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aiken Keppler

customer_reviews.title: works great in instant pot
customer_reviews.text: the small pan was all i needed for cheese cake in instant pot, but got three for the price of two
customer_reviews.author: Puzzlelover101

customer_reviews.title: ... large one here is a little smaller so it's like my set is complete
customer_reviews.text: very excited for this set i already had a large one but even the large one here is a little smaller so it's like my set is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: So Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm no baker and have never used a Springform pan (and quiet frankly, didn't know what a 'springform pan' was), but these pans are Great. Easy to use and sturdy. Very easy to clean, just rinse with a warm soapy sponge. Nothing sticks to the non-stick surface. I baked my first cheesecake and it came out perfect. No leaks. Great investment. Look no further, these pans are the Best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These pans were better than expected. I just needed the middle size, but the price was to good to pass up getting the package deal. I made a chocolate mousse tart. I was very pleased with the non-stick and quick release. Can’t wait to try other things. Maybe even my nemesis-cheesecake.
customer_reviews.author: WKW123

customer_reviews.title: MAKES GOOD CAKE
customer_reviews.text: just as the title says, made some excellent cake using these. The latch is easy to remove and easy to re-latch. Just make sure to wash it thoroughly through each use abd you'll mske perfect cake everytime.
customer_reviews.author: SoMuchNoise

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as I began acquiring my cheesecake making skills, they're sturdy and well made, nonstick so cleanup is a breeze, and every time I've made a cheesecake they've been the foundation for them and made baking them a breeze. I would highly recommend to others and if I need to purchase another set I would choose these.
customer_reviews.author: GKL&GQMJ

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: I used the 10” for a cheesecake and put it in a water bath. This pan says leakproof. It’s NOT!!! My crust was ruined. So glad I had not poured the cheesecake mixture in before I noticed it was soggy!
customer_reviews.author: kevin contello

customer_reviews.title: leakage
customer_reviews.text: sent this item back. so disappointed in these pans. leaked all over the bottom of my stove and started burning went thru the whole house, Had to open all the doors and windows to ventilate the house. Thank goodness I live in Florida so December is fairly mild. BUT WHAT A MESS. Plus It ruined my cheesecake for Christmas and you know the expense of the ingredients. OK I'm done ranting.
customer_reviews.author: Shades

customer_reviews.title: No more cake pans for me!!
customer_reviews.text: Never used these before but don’t think I’ll ever go back to cake pan! Cooked well. Came off cake easy. Easy to clean. I kept the boxes and stored them easily on shelf
customer_reviews.author: CAB Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Bakers up!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Was exactly what I was looking for, the baker in the family was satisfied and says these work amazingly. And it came with non stick sheets as a plus! Great purchase, would definitely recommend to any baker.
customer_reviews.author: Deveroux

customer_reviews.title: Great Sizes of pans!
customer_reviews.text: I made a raspberry cheese cake. I was very pleased because i had left over batter and was able to make a baby one with the small pan! I also was pleased at how quickly it arrived!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Smith

customer_reviews.title: It leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make my first custard cake and I am very disappointed because it leaks. At first I used the 8" then it leaked. I grab the 10" pan and wrapped it with aluminum foil. I did it because I needed a pan and I already mixed my ingredients. I am so disappointed 😞 You can see the foil and the ingredients that leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Marie B Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not completely leak proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! It will NOT leak with cake batter and such. But it leaked when I try to make pudding/creme Brulee in it.. causing a huge kitchen disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Amiel Chen

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it works. Just not great.
customer_reviews.text: Okay not leak proof at all, but that's to be expected. I wrapped it in foil. And the texture at the bottom made removing the crust difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great! I made a cake and despite some reviews saying that their cakes leaked- mine did not and it wasn’t a cheesecake- it was regular cake batter. Also I did wrap aluminum foil around the pan just in case but it was fine! Easy to use and clean! Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steve21

customer_reviews.title: They sealed perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love the pans the papers were a little over sized on one pan and touch small on another, and you guessed it one set of papers was just right..... not kidding... Love the pans!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mauisun

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Easy to use and didn’t stick at all. Would highly recommended. Only thing I don’t like is the cake sticks into the small wholes & lips in the pans. The parchment paper was a nice add and made clean up easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lamb

customer_reviews.title: RUSTY PANS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this for a few months and used it only twice, after washing it the second time all my pans became rusted. Amazon wouldn’t refund me because the 30 days passed. I DO NOT recommend this to anyone. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: NOT leakproof.  Please be careful if waterbathing.
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely NOT leakproof. For cheesecakes with a waterbath, I surround them with a silicone cake pan and then waterbath them. Please don't trust them alone in a waterbath. They hand wash easily and the parchment sheets fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen VanGorder

customer_reviews.title: Easy care pans.
customer_reviews.text: Pans are easy to use and don't leak. Recipe I needed them for had to be set in foil and emerged in water during cooking. There was no leakage during the cooking process.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L. Van Delft

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use.
customer_reviews.text: After one use, the large springform didn’t lock into place. It was so loose the base fell right through. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriadora

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Very easy to use, love the three sizes! Easy to clean. So glad I bought these- def good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Too small... holding off til quarantine is over
customer_reviews.text: Really small.. smaller than the ones I bought at bed bath & beyond. Gonna hold off on buying things until quarantine is over. Stay safe
customer_reviews.author: norma a.

customer_reviews.title: Really good product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to make her quarantine birthday cake and we loved using them. They didn’t leak and were super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wong

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Cheese cake turns out great, very easy clean up, best part I gave them as a gift and I now get all kinds of different cheese cakes for holidays and I don't have to bake them, I do however get to clean the pans... thats the easy part... very easy
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly leak proof but I haven't found a spring form pan yet that is 100% so this one did pretty well all in all. Feels like good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Jmo

customer_reviews.title: Great but one leaked
customer_reviews.text: I only did a 2 star because the little one leaked on the first use. Other than that I like the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Swifts

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more than 5 stars for value, I would do it. The 3 springforms are great. Clean up is a breeze. But they included an off set spatula & a scraper for the price--FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.author: robb quick

customer_reviews.title: Springform Pan
customer_reviews.text: I made cheesecake for the first time and the large springform pan was perfect. It worked perfectly and is of very good quality. It came with smaller sizes and now I can make gift cheesecakes for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Perchez

customer_reviews.title: hilware springform pans
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. There is a small amount of "leakage" but better than other pans I've used. Love the liners that come with them
customer_reviews.author: Jean D. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: They leak like it's their job. This causes difficulty in removal and clean up. Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for New Bakers
customer_reviews.text: I am a new baker and I loved this set! I didn't even realize that I needed the icing spatula, but it worked great too! Everything is easy to use for other newbies out there. Also, it is dishwasher safe- HUGE Perk!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this at all. I tried making a flan and it started to leak on the sides. All three leaked it wasn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: spring pans that work
customer_reviews.text: These spring pans do the job. They haven't leaked, look well made, and come with parchment paper that makes them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hom

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Water seeps back into the japanese cheese cake I was trying to make. I had to throw it away. It could have been a great cake. What a waste of my money! Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: tigger

customer_reviews.title: Rust at first sight
customer_reviews.text: We receive these 3 days ago and washed them for use. They immediately began to rust. We’re returning them without having had any use of them, and hope that anyone seeing this shops for a better made product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sizes in a set
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend, especially because of the different sizes that come as a set. The spatula is perfectly sized, also. Looking visually quality looks great. I know she’ll enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: LEAKY :(
customer_reviews.text: Very sad to say they leak when cake mix is baked in them. Didn’t start until they were in the oven :( very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: the metal is thin but does the work
customer_reviews.text: on the whole, the cake pan does what it describes. the metal is quite thin but the non-stick and springform features are perfect for baking cake
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully easy to use and easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: I baked a pumpkin cheesecake, using the 4” and the 7” pans. They came out well, and they cleaned well. I did have some leaking, however. Not enough to hate these products, but enough to mess up the bottom of my oven! Next time, I’ll place a cookie sheet on the rack below them.
customer_reviews.author: Caron

customer_reviews.title: Lovely spring-form pans
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pans because I wanted to start baking cheese cakes and needed a spring form pan. These are easy to use and come in multiple sizes for whatever your baking needs are. One of my pans lost a piece of hardware and the seller was quick to send a replacement pan free of charge. Highly recommend these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Lee Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Not the high-end springform pans - but for the price, great value and they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I recently have learned how to make cheesecake and this pan has been a great help. Easy to use, and even easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wuzthere

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: Washed prior to using and it rusted! Very, very cheaply made to the point where I didn’t even use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Love the color too. My sister and I make cheesecakes a lot. We share them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue G.

customer_reviews.title: 8" pan not functioning after use. 😓😓
customer_reviews.text: I love my pan's and they made some really AWESOME cheesecakes. After washing and getting them back together to store them my 8" pan does NOT go back together like the other 2. Can I get a replacement? I just love them and plan to make many more cheesecakes with them! I still rate you very high on quality and service. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Moretti

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Used a parchment paper on the bottom and cake came out very easy. Excited to continue using. I would suggest to buy pan sized parchment paper before baking. Hand wash pans when done to extend life.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckveith

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Made my first ever cheesecake with this and I loved the experience! The pan was perfect and the liners were a great added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ross

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: the bottom of the pan is not level so the cake was not level.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set of springform pans! Love the size options. Totally nonstick, too!
customer_reviews.author: lizzieo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pan
customer_reviews.text: I mad a cheese cake in this and it did not leak, very nice set and very good nonstick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Medicine Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received the items. Haven’t had a chance to use them but they appear to be good quality and they shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pans are great quality
customer_reviews.text: I baked a cheesecake in the middle-sized pan and had zero issues with sticking or leaking! 4 stars because the included frosting tool and spatula are low quality but will do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna G

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Price
customer_reviews.text: Performed as expected. The included pre-cut parchment was a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Debi B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are great cheesecake pans and I love the fact that they included precut liners for the bottoms of the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Duvall

customer_reviews.title: they came really fast and seem well made
customer_reviews.text: nicely made, heavy; the included parchment paper cut outs are a real bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described! With a nice personal touch!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet because I bought them specifically for Thanksgiving. But they look, feel, and work just as described. It is from a family business so they leave a special card in the package as a thank you. It also comes with a little cleaning towel, which is a nice touch! I'm super happy with them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I've them!? Made three perfect cheesecakes and cleanup was a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Eagles wings

customer_reviews.title: I lik eit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Item packed well, easy to open box. I used he 7” to make cheesecake. Easy to put together after washing, cheesecake came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: hivirgie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Good product that cleans up easily. Good price and quick Prime delivery
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I made a pumpkin torte and the butter from the crust does leak out but I just put it on a foil lined sheet pan. No problem. Nice pans. Delivered fast. What more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even clip on
customer_reviews.text: It's not just leaking that's a problem - the pan doesn't even securely clip to the bottom. Even though I reattached it over and over, the bottom would pop off every time I tried to pick it up. In the end I picked it up by the bottom and carefully walked it over to the oven, where the bottom popped off one final time, ruining my cheesecake.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing ever it leaks everywhere !!! Don’t buy this

product_meta.title: Hiware Springform Pan Set of 3 Non-stick Cheesecake Pan, Leakproof Round Cake Pan Set Includes 3 Piece 4" 7" 9" Springform Pan, Icing Spatula and Icing Smoother
feature_bullets: This springform pan set includes 3 piece non-stick pans (4 inch, 7 inch, 9 inch), 1 icing spatula and 1 icing smoother

The pans can be used to create beautiful three layer cakes suited for any occasion, icing spatula is perfect for making layered cakes and spread icing evenly, icing smoother for creating a perfect designs on the side or top of cakes
​The non-sticky surfaces of the pans make it easier for you to take the cake out without damaging its structure or texture

If you are a person who loves making cakes and other oven baked dishes and want to have cake pans of different sizes, then this is the perfect set of springform pans that you can look into. Whether you are planning to bake a small cake as a dessert for a romantic dinner for two, or you are baking a family-sized cheesecake, this set will have you covered
